summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4188 for the improvement of North 82nd Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Fremont Avenue; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 49846, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
